content: this is a great pattern because its quick to knit up makes a great gift and can be customised across all yarn weights a perfect project for beginners i have chosen a very simple lace pattern that gives you that looks much harder than it actually is effect you could also customise this and make it narrower and longer to create a wrap instead of a blanket the stitch count below is to complete a blanket measuring approx 120cm wide to adjust width increase or decrease by a multiple of 12 stitches to maintain pattern the gauge is a guide for how many stitches per 10cm yarn is approximate estimate to allow you to customise as desired - the more yarn the wider and longer you can make your blanket
